# CPApplicationDelegate

**Protocol**

The interface for handling CarPlay life-cycle events.

## Declaration

```swift
protocol CPApplicationDelegate : UIApplicationDelegate
```

## Overview

You must implement [doc://com.apple.carplay/documentation/CarPlay/CPApplicationDelegate] on the same object that serves as the delegate to your app.

## Connecting to the CarPlay Interface

- **application(_:didConnectCarInterfaceController:to:)**: Tells the app delegate that the app connected to the CarPlay interface.
- **application(_:didDisconnectCarInterfaceController:from:)**: Tells the app delegate that the app disconnected from the CarPlay interface.

## Receiving the Selected Maneuver

- **application(_:didSelect:)**: Tells the app delegate that the user selected a maneuver.

## Handling Navigation Alert Actions

- **application(_:didSelect:)**: Tells the app delegate that the user selected an action from a navigation alert.

## Inherits From

- NSObjectProtocol
- UIApplicationDelegate
